Presenting Health and Christian 
        Standards [SEE ALSO PP. 513-551, 
        "MEDICAL EVANGELISM," AND PP. 657-665, 
            "HEALTH AND HEALTH PRINCIPLES."] 


     Presenting Health Reform.--Our work is to be practical. We are to remember that man has a body as 
                                                                           261
well as a soul to save. Our work includes far more than standing before the people to preach to them. In our work we are to minister to the physical infirmities of those with whom we are brought in contact. We are to present the principles of health reform, impressing our hearers with the thought that they have a part to act in keeping themselves in health.
